title: AI is 'Backbone' of Venture Capital Landscape, Says Western Alliance's Bob Curley
description: Bob Curley, deputy chief banking officer of regional banking at Western Alliance Bank, told Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec AI is the backbone of the venture capital landscape. He also said they're seeing it accelerated in energy and science. He also said the M&A Market has rebounded and brough additional sources of liquidity. (Source: Bloomberg)
